item.description:
Tara has kindly stepped up to the plate and will be hosting the meetup. Jeff will be heading out to Greece with the group to visit Athens and the Islands.

Come meet like-minded adventure travelers who are interested in exploring exciting and off-the-beaten-path destinations around the world. Share stories of past adventures and talk about future ones! It doesn't matter whether you are a solo traveler, a couple or just friends; everyone is welcome. Please contact me if you'd like to attend so I can be sure to keep an eye out for you. Email Jeff through MeetUp. We try to meet at the high tables toward the back of the Rattlesnake Bar (384 Boylston St in Boston)... Tara will be wearing an easy to spot yellow v-neck sweater and the yellow baseball hat will sit on the table looking for company...
item.how_to_find_us: Tara will be wearing an easy to spot yellow v-neck sweater and the yellow baseball hat will sit on the table looking for company...
item.name: Boston International Adventure Travel Club June Meetup
